title: Is it just me or is MF broken on ARAM?
body:
I went 9/0 before I had to 'die' to shop...or is it just cuz I had a Sona on my team...
It wasn't even hard, MF on ARAM seems broken and easy at the same time...

replies.body: It's Sona. Healers are ridiculously valuable on ARAM, especially in the early game. They tend to fall off if there are no tanks on their team, and/or when the other team has a "balanced" composition. With MF, she's good for some poke. Take Deathfire, grab a Rod of Ages as your first item and just spam E. That's what I always do and it usually ends with me having few deaths (so long as there's a good amount of coordination on my team).

bruh, 3 year old thread
